metadata.title: Where Is the Circuit Diagram of the Touch Evaluation Kit?

sections.content:
Question:
Can you provide the circuit diagram used in the touch evaluation kit?
Answer:
Circuit diagram can be downloaded from Capacitive Touch solution WEB page.
Select the kit and obtain the circuit diagram.
https://www.renesas.com/solutions/touch-key
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
